What is Gelli

Gelli is a small, one woman company dedicated to sustainability,
and making it easier for the public to transition into a more Eco-friendly and environmentally aware lifestyle.
Gelli combines everything you could ever need to make this transition and puts it one place,
and provides only the highest quality products for the best price.

Contact us! Gelli@GellyJels.com

Making Eco-friendly alternatives more accessible and saving the planet one metal straw at a time
